body_html:
Oh! I didn't think of the float16 case.

Maybe the first-best would be to rename the current epsilon to epsilon_hat (with a deprecation notice for the moment), then possibly add a proper epsilon later on?

body:
Oh! I didn't think of the float16 case.

Maybe the first-best would be to rename the current `epsilon` to `epsilon_hat` (with a deprecation notice for the moment), then possibly add a proper `epsilon` later on?
